synopsis.text: The Digimon Adventure anime film series follows Meiko Mochizuki and her partner Digimon, Meicoomon. In the fifth film, Meicoomon is forced to dark evolve into the dangerous Meicrackmon after witnessing Meiko get hurt. Meicrackmon then disappears into the distorted Digital World, now possessing overwhelming power that makes her the key to the world's destruction. As the countdown begins to the real world's demise, the DigiDestined attempt to find their way back home while evading enemies. Meiko worries that Meicrackmon is a Digimon that should never have existed. Powerful good Digimon like Omnimon, Jesmon, and Alphamon face off against Meicrackmon and other infected Digimon in battle. Meanwhile, in the human world, a messenger from Homeostasis meets with Meiko’s father and Daigo to reveal Meicrackmon’s origins. They plan to eliminate her, regardless of the children’s feelings, to prevent more Digimon from materializing on Earth. As friends become enemies, the DigiDestined race to stop the distortion between worlds and save Meicrackmon before it’s too late.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
